pullRequest.title: #6125 Docaction Permission not taken properly for Bank Statement

commit.message: #6125 Doc action permissions for a role are now seen without manually reseting the cache.
#6125 Changed method name to a more suitable one.

nodes.bodyText: what is the ModelCacheInvalidationTiming about? why NEW?
FYI, you can also annotate the  model interceptor with @Component, then spring will do the magic on startup
